media.title: Supporting media in the digital age
media.description:
CORUS has been a pioneer in the digitization of media. Its experience covers both services and projects with leading companies in the sector, as well as new developments and innovation for digital companies. We help our clients adapt to the new digital world, achieve their business objectives and enhance their competitive advantages.

Content management: we work with the main content managers in the market, designing, creating and managing audiovisual content platforms in an integral way. We manage portals with millions of users in 24x7 mode, assuming responsibility for its operation, security and content management.

Internet video: we have a long experience in the production and broadcasting of video over the Internet, both live and on demand (VOD), and are specialists in aspects such as massive distribution of content, streaming, use of CDN's and securitization of digital assets.

Live "virtual" events: we have developed solutions for the management, coordination and broadcasting of live events, making the contribution of different signals, local and/or remote participants and social content for the broadcasting of events such as conferences, presentations and live events of all kinds.

finance.title: Walking towards digital transformation in the financial sector
finance.description:
CORUS collaborates with large companies and organizations in the financial sector in their digital transformation, helping to switch the office-based model to one based on the Internet and mobile applications, creating new services and adapting processes to the new reality demanded by customers.

Processes: we aid in the digitalization of our clients, participating in the initiation, definition, improvement and automation of key processes in banks and financial institutions, achieving significant improvements in productivity and predictability of operations.

Risk analysis: risk analysis solutions have been implemented in both the public and private sectors, allowing for greater precision in the analysis of large volumes of transactions.

Mobile applications: We have designed and implemented mobile applications, applying the most modern usability techniques, adapting the user interfaces to the different characteristics of the clients and their ability to use digital devices.

insurance.title: Value added solutions in the insurance sector
insurance.description:
CORUS has experience in the insurance sectors in Europe, the United States and Latin America, and is familiar with the characteristics of these businesses in the different markets and the challenges faced by their information systems.

Contracting and issuance: we develop innovative solutions for the processes of contracting and documentation in the issuance, both for the general public and for companies and industry.

Claims Management: we collaborate with customers of different sizes and needs in claims handling, appraisal, damage assessment, repair and replacement, improving processes and quality in customer service.

Collection Management: we support the improvement of processes and systems for collection management, finance and actuarial calculation, providing innovative solutions such as pay-as-you-go systems in automobile insurance.

integration-api.title: Systems integration / API
integration-api.description:
The information systems of organizations are composed of a large number of heterogeneous solutions that need to be integrated into a coherent and manageable model that serves the business, now and in the future.

And it is precisely because of this need for interoperability between cloud, on-premise, mobile, sensor and social network services and applications, where the evolution from the traditional concept of integration platform (EAI/ESB) to the hybrid integration platform (HIP) and EiPaaS enterprise tools comes in.

This evolution of integration platforms is ideally complemented by today's APIS and microservices exposure and management tools.

Undoubtedly, system integration and API management have become a key part of enterprise architectures.
integration-api.experience:
One of the main hallmarks of CORUS is its firm commitment to convert the integration of systems and information of companies in the foundations of their own digital transformation.

We collaborat with companies of multiple sectors and sizes in the definition of their data integration model, their system architecture, and APIfication of their services, in a constant search for efficiency, agility, and alignment with business.

To this end, we collaborate with the architecture and application development teams to establish well-defined system governance mechanisms, allowing its evolution from the current situation to the target model and taking into account the changes that will occur due to the evolution of the business in a highly competitive environment.

We invite you to rethink your company's current integration strategy, new platform(s) may be needed to extend your existing platforms to your current solution in the face of the technological challenges ahead. Our goal for the near future is to provide businesses with a self-service model applied to the world of integration.

security.description: All the elements of the architecture, each one of the systems and the communications between them must take into account information security for their design, implementation and deployment.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: The goal should always be to allow maximum flexibility in the evolution of each of the systems independently, the incorporation of new systems, and to facilitate the retirement of obsolete systems.

process.title: Processes
process.description:
We are specialists in the transformation and governance of business processes, enterprise architecture management and the technologies that support these disciplines.

Our vocation is to improve people's experience and organizations' performance through a business process-centric approach inspired by innovation and technology.

We apply design principles and practices to help organizations create value, increase their competitive advantage, transform and improve their business, and align with the ever-changing environment.
process.experience:
A process-driven organisation encourages and enables its business processes to be oriented towards improving the customer experience and integrating agilely and efficiently with its teams and applications. Performance is not a matter of luck but of design and adaptability to change.

We are a team of professionals, with extensive practical experience from different disciplines, who work together offering an efficient combination of analytical and creative thinking as an essential element to tackle transformation and process management projects through the objective analysis of the situation and the incorporation of innovative ideas.

We work with tools and methodologies that allow a high level of cooperation with our clients, maintaining a global and integrated approach, both at the governance level and in the design, change and implementation of business processes.

iot-ai.title: IoT & IA
iot-ai.description:
IoT allows real-time sensorization and monitoring of environments, machines, and people. This detection must be adjusted to each circumstance and carefully not interfere with the element that displays.

The sending of information from remote systems and IoT servers must be adapted to the different connectivity capabilities. For this, a study must be carried out to design and implement the best solution for each case, guaranteeing that the information remains secure and complete throughout .

On the information obtained, in addition to tracking and monitoring, we can establish thresholds using rules, trend analysis with time series analysis, as well as discovery and identification of complex patterns through Machine Learning techniques. All of these techniques allow us to anticipate risk situations and maintenance needs.

Additionally, the use of artificial vision and recognition systems through AI enable the identification of colors, shapes and trajectories that allows IoT solutions to go further, being able to act in an efficient way on unforeseen elements.

With all these elements and carefully analyzing customer needs, CORUS IoT systems not only collect and analyze information, they also allow acting on remote elements, and automatically sending alerts, commands and orders to devices and people. This way the IoT solutions become high value systems.
iot-ai.experience:
CORUS has designed and implemented solutions for the protection of workers in industrial environments and service sectors, allowing for the anticipation of risk situations, alerting workers and notifying supervisors in case of incidents.

Capabilities for real-time image analysis using AI has allowed CORUS to develop advanced systems for the detection of vehicles, analysis of volumes in warehouses, identification of people and their proximity to virtual barriers, etc.

Our team is prepared to face any challenge in the industrial and health environment, having a wide range of specialists in the different disciplines that ensure the quality and adaptation of solutions to each environment.

ux.title: UX / UI
ux.description:
Adequately defining the user experience, as well as the sensation, feeling, emotional response, User evaluation and satisfaction with a product/service is key to its success. It's necessary to care at all times about the interaction of people with our designs.

The user interface design of the applications contemplates the selection of the appropriate elements to achieve and organize the screen in a way that is easier for the user to understand and use. The objective is to make the user interaction as efficient and simple as possible.

New environments and devices, such as voice assistants, virtual environments or augmented reality, require new interaction and usability models that allow the user to act naturally, simple and satisfying, without fanfare, and without having to think about it.
ux.experience:
At CORUS we have collaborated with organizations from different sectors in the definition and design of digital solutions for computers, tablets, smartphones and devices, conversational solutions for virtual assistants like Alexa and Echo, and augmented reality solutions for smart glasses.

Our team works experimentally and in detail to adapt the interface to the needs of each product, of the channels of communication and interaction of the user, and their capacities and abilities for the device management.

Designing an application for a business environment is not the same as designing a solution for the industrial environment, where the capabilities of interaction with keyboards and screens is limited, or the health of workers or the elderly. We have carried out projects in different environments and sectors that allow us to successfully address new forms of interaction with the user.

devise.title: Devise
devise.description: It aims to generate endless options. In this phase, the activities favor the expansive thinking, and we must eliminate value judgments. Sometimes the most outlandish ideas are the ones generating visionary solutions.

prototype.title: Prototype
prototype.description: We make the ideas come true. Building prototypes makes them palpable and helps us visualize possible solutions, highlighting elements that we must improve or refine.

check.title: Check
check.description: We will test our prototypes with the users involved in the solution we are developing. this phase is crucial, and it will help us identify significant improvements, bugs to solve, possible deficiencies. This garantees we get the MVP.

cms.title: Content Management Systems
cms.description:
Successfully managing the digital experience of customers across different channels, platforms or markets is complex. CORUS helps its clients create the best user experience throughout this process. Through our design services, content management, implementation and integration of CMS and eCommerce platforms, we create new ways of success and innovation for our clients.

Increase online B2B revenue, create new self-service experiences for customers, integrate different systems into the company's web platform or managing audiovisual content effectively are new challenges in which CORUS has the experience and proven guarantee of success.

Our experience in open source CMS environments such as WordPress, Drupal, Joomla and other platforms gives us a service that contemplates all aspects of a professional solution, with 360º vision and 24x7 assistance.
cms.experience:
CORUS implements high-performance, high-complexity sites for organizations of multiple sectors, from health, to news agencies, through specialized video sites, corporate websites, etc.

In each case the design, content, infrastructure and security are adapted to the requirements of each organization, offering a complete solution, covering all aspects of construction and exploitation of a professional CMS.

We currently maintain and operate more than 100 sites, in 40 countries, with millions of visits monthly, providing 24x7 support to the infrastructure, and working with the client's teams for the maintenance and content management.

video.description:
Today, Internet video consumption is fully integrated into the digital experience of customers, both in video on demand (VOD) and live (streaming). From the big content platforms, going through news sites, social networks, even videoconferences, we find some of the most important formats for entertainment, communication and business.

The production and transmission of video content over the Internet requires a series of techniques, tools and specific methodologies to guarantee the quality of the experience, the speed of response and the security of the content. The use of CDN services, the security of digital assets and the management of an optimal user experience are fundamental aspects.

Video-based websites, players, image and sound quality in different network conditions, adaptation for different devices and platforms and the correct management of rights must be taken into account for the success of the communication.

develop.title: Development
develop.description:
The construction of business solutions must be based on a development architecture that facilitates the efficiency and effectiveness of work teams. This productivity is key to being able to deliver quality functionalities in time, to add value to the business.

One of the main elements for the productivity and predictability of development is the definition and use of a consistent and proven model of reusable components. This way, each functionality is encapsulated in a clearly defined piece that can be used by all members of the team with the peace of mind that it is a well-built and tested part.

Another key to the interconnection of systems, both internal and externally, is the definition and use of APIs. A well-defined programming interface allows each team to interact with the rest of the systems in an organized, coherent and secure way.

In order to build quality systems, solutions and applications, we must have highly qualified teams, cohesive and who know how to work with agility and responsibility. Development teams must be able to efficiently face each challenge that is presented to them, applying the architecture, Component model and defined API.
develop.experience:
We collaborate with companies of a wide range sectors and sizes building solutions, establishing application architecture, defining component models and establishing APIs that allow us to offer quality functionalities, scalable and maintainable.

We have highly qualified teams in Javascript development, both front -with frameworks and React, Angular or Vue-, and back, with Node. We collaborate with the Javascript community, participating actively in the definition of the language in the committee TC39 of standardization of EcmaScript.

Together with the UX/UI team, we develop solutions for all types of environments: desktop, mobile applications, conversational systems based on voice assistants, and virtual reality environments.

qa.title: Quality assurance
qa.description:
Any quality assurance model must begin by establishing a quality culture, which always takes into consideration the delivery of revised, well-built, robust and adaptable products.

Once this culture is assumed by the organization, the creation of quality control teams allows us to have a greater specialization in the methodologies, techniques and tools necessary for a correct assurance of the quality of our products and processes.

Quality should be measured as a means to improvement. If something is not measured, it is very difficult to improve it. This measurement must take into account the unique characteristics of each project, including each team and circumstance.

Quality involves testing, both manual and automated. Manual testing is still important to guarantee the correct adequacy of the solutions to the specifications, as well as the ergonomics and usability of interfaces. Automated tests make it possible to guarantee standards that every product must comply, as well as facilitate the stability of solutions in the face of changes and modifications.
qa.experience:
CORUS has strong quality culture established in its organization. Our teams carry out tests and reviews for all phases of the solution construction process, allowing the delivery of products of high quality and reliability.

We have specialized teams in the definition, implementation and construction of automated test environments that adjust to the needs of each organization, the available data, the equipment work, and deployment systems used.

We have collaborated with organizations from different sectors in the creation of quality teams and methodologies, as well as its implementation in the teams, facilitating the transition to a model based on quality in all the processes and activities.
